page.title: 20EDUCATION
page.content:
The information on our area was gathered by the children from Beech Grove Junior School,St.James Primary School,St.Peter's Comprehensive School and St.Mary's Junior School. The schools in our area have seen much change over the last few years.This has been because of falling rolls which has caused the amalgamation of some schools.The new road going through Grangetown has meant that Grangetown Primary school has had to move to a different building and this in turn led to other schools in Grangetown having to move too .
The work was edited by:G.M.O'CONNOR.
